subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
The overall purpose fo the Project is to implement several areas of the Round 8 HIV Grant specifically:
1. Service Delivery Area 1.2. which works with HIV and the mass media in Somalia
2. Service Delivery Area 3.1 which focuses on support to AIDS Commissions. UNDP will be specifically responsible for the mangement and strengthening of the South Central AIDS Commission (SCAC).
3. Service Delivery Area 3.2. which focuses on policy development, including workplace policy
4. Service Delivery Areas 3.3 whcih focuses on leadership and governance
5. Service Deilvery Area 4.1 which focuses on Strategic governance
subproject.title: GF Round 8
